titleInfo.title: Young Children Playing with a Stethoscope

physicalDescription.extent: 2 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#174 National Jewish Hospital''. On back of photograph: ''#174 Both children after heart surgery at NJH, 1961, B'nai B'rith Coll. National Jewish Hospital, Denver est. 1899''.

mods.abstract: Two young children playing with a stethoscope at National Jewish Hospital. The children were photographed after having heart surgery at the hospital.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
